catch_line: Effect Of Renumbering Or Redesignation Of Provisions Or Sections In Statutes Or Codes Of The State Of California Which Are Referred To In The Los Angeles Municipal Code.
full_text:
EFFECT OF RENUMBERING OR REDESIGNATION OF PROVISIONS OR SECTIONS IN STATUTES OR CODES OF THE STATE OF CALIFORNIA WHICH ARE REFERRED TO IN THE LOS ANGELES MUNICIPAL CODE.
	(Added by Ord. No. 116,431, Eff. 7/30/60.)

	Whenever in this Code reference is made to any designation or numbered provision of any Statute or Code of the State of California, such reference shall be deemed to be to such provision or section as it may be redesignated or renumbered from time to time by act of the Legislature of the State of California in amending or recodifying such Statute, Code or provision or section thereof, to the extent that by such legislative act the intent and meaning of the provision or section remains substantially unchanged.

8.catch_line: City Departments Exempt From Paying Fees Or Charges Required By This Code.

10.catch_line: Exemptions Relating To The Los Angeles 200Th Anniversary Celebration.

11.catch_line: Use Of The Metric System Of Measure As An Alternative System Of Measurement

12.catch_line:
Summary Of Fees For Bureau Of Engineering Services
Provided Pursuant To The Provisions Of This Chapter.

dublin_core.Title: Effect Of Renumbering Or Redesignation Of Provisions Or Sections In Statutes Or Codes Of The State Of California Which Are Referred To In The Los Angeles Municipal Code.

plain_text:
LOS ANGELES MUNICIPAL CODE

EFFECT OF RENUMBERING OR REDESIGNATION OF PROVISIONS OR SECTIONS IN STATUTES OR
CODES OF THE STATE OF CALIFORNIA WHICH ARE REFERRED TO IN THE LOS ANGELES
MUNICIPAL CODE. (§ 11.05)

  EFFECT OF RENUMBERING OR REDESIGNATION OF PROVISIONS OR SECTIONS IN STATUTES
OR CODES OF THE STATE OF CALIFORNIA WHICH ARE REFERRED TO IN THE LOS ANGELES
MUNICIPAL CODE.
	(Added by Ord. No. 116,431, Eff. 7/30/60.)	Whenever in this Code reference is
made to any designation or numbered provision of any Statute or Code of the
State of California, such reference shall be deemed to be to such provision or
section as it may be redesignated or renumbered from time to time by act of the
Legislature of the State of California in amending or recodifying such Statute,
Code or provision or section thereof, to the extent that by such legislative act
the intent and meaning of the provision or section remains substantially
unchanged.

Whenever in this Code reference is made to any designation or numbered provision of any Statute or Code of the State of California, such reference shall be deemed to be to such provision or section as it may be redesignated or renumbered from time to time by act of the Legislature of the State of California in amending or recodifying such Statute, Code or provision or section thereof, to the extent that by such legislative act the intent and meaning of the provision or section remains substantially unchanged.
